content: NBL 6-22 Cordless blower Powerful jobsite blower for clearing jobsite debris and preparing work surfaces (Nuron battery platform) ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Jobsite essentials- - - ### FEATURES:Features Powerful debris removal – boost mode produces up to 13 m3/min of air volume at 187 kph, helping you quickly clear virtually any type of jobsite debris Powerful debris removal – boost mode produces up to 460 CFM of air volume at 119 mph, helping you quickly clear virtually any type of jobsite debris Optimized battery reach – efficient brushless motor and long-lasting Nuron batteries for more runtime and less time charging Easy to adjust and transport – telescopic blower tube can be easily extended during use, or collapsed and removed for transport and storage Comfortable handling – cruise control mode and optional shoulder strap support effortless operation at set speed Applications Clearing jobsite debris – clearing rebar tie wires, wood/ metal chips, plastic debris, light snow, water, etc. from trucks and work areas Preparing work surfaces – cleaning equipment, removing dust from work surfaces, preventative maintenance, and more ### TECHNICAL DATA: Air volume: 460 ft³ / min Max air velocity: 119 mile/h Min air velocity: 99 mile/h Technical Data | Air volume | 459.1 cfm | Max air velocity | 116 mile/h | Min air velocity | 98 mile/h | A-weighted emission sound pressure level | 100 dB (A) | 1 | Battery System | Nuron | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) ### ITEMS- 2404229 - Cordless blower NBL 6-22 box - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x NBL 6-22 Cordless blower
